slates.title: Slates
slates.description: Generate slates and attach them to rendered.

workfiles.title: Workfiles
workfiles.description: Save and load workfiles in progress. Change the context inside of the application.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Universal GUI for defining content for publishing from your DCC app.

loader.title: Loader
loader.description: Universal GUI for loading published assets into your DCC app.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Universal GUI for validating and publishing content from your DCC app.

sceneManager.title: Scene manager
sceneManager.description: Universal GUI for managing versions of assets loaded into your working scene.

projectManager.title: Project manager
projectManager.description: Tools for creating shots, assets and task within your project if you don't use third party project management

libraryLoader.title: Library Loader
libraryLoader.description: A loader GUI that allows yo to load content from dedicated cross project asset library

trayPublisher.title: Tray Publisher
trayPublisher.description: A standalone GUI for publishing data into pipeline without going though DCC app.

appLauncher.title: App Launcher
appLauncher.description: Standalone GUI for launching application in the chosen context directly from tray

configurationGUI.title: Configuration GUI
configurationGUI.description: All settings and configuration are done via AYON Settings tool. No need to dig around .json and .yaml

siteSync.title: Site Sync
siteSync.description: Built in file synchronization between your central storage (cloud or physical) and all your freelancers

timersManager.title: Timers Manager
timersManager.description: Service for monitoring the user activity to start, stop and synchronise time tracking.

farmRendering.title: Farm rendering
farmRendering.description: Integrations with Deadline and Muster render managers. Render, publish and generate reviews on the farm.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: Production proven in fully remote workflows. Pype can run of cloud servers and storage.

sceneBuilder.title: Scene Builder
sceneBuilder.description: System for simple scene building. Loads pre-defined publishes to scene with single click, speeding up scene preparation.

reviewables.title: Reviewables
reviewables.description: Generate automated reviewable quicktimes and sequences in any format, with metadata burnins.

scriptBuilding.title: Script Building
scriptBuilding.description: Automatically build initial workfiles from published plates or renders

colorManaged.title: Color Managed
colorManaged.description: Fully colour managed outputs for work and review

nodePresets.title: Node Presets
nodePresets.description: Template system for centrally controlled node parameters.

rendering.title: Rendering
rendering.description: Support for local and farm renders, including baked reviews.
